alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact portions of Clinton, northeastern Franklin and northeastern Essex Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 435 PM EDT, snow showers were reported along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Fort Covington to near Bryants Mill. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Plattsburgh International Airport, Plattsburgh, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Saranac, Mooers, Altona, Ellenburg Depot, Bryants Mill, Lyon Mountain, Burke, Merrill, Clayburg, Malone, Churubusco, Debar Mountain, Jericho, Chateaugay and Dannemora. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 139 and 154.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton
